tripleplay.ui

Class MenuHost.Pop

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop
  • Enclosing class:
    MenuHost

    public static class MenuHost.Pop
extends Object
    An event type for triggering a menu popup.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      pythagoras.f.IRectangle bounds
      The bounds to confine the menu, in screen coordinates; usually the whole screen.
      Menu menu
      The menu to show.
      pythagoras.f.IPoint pointer
      The position of the pointer, if given during construction, otherwise null.
      Element<?> trigger
      The element that triggered the popup.

    • Field Detail

      • trigger

        public final Element<?> trigger
        The element that triggered the popup. #position is relative to this.

      • menu

        public final Menu menu
        The menu to show.

      • pointer

        public final pythagoras.f.IPoint pointer
        The position of the pointer, if given during construction, otherwise null.

      • bounds

        public pythagoras.f.IRectangle bounds
        The bounds to confine the menu, in screen coordinates; usually the whole screen.

            Menu menu,

        Creates a new event and initializes trigger and menu.

    • Method Detail

      • relayEvents

        public MenuHost.Pop relayEvents(Layer layer)
        Causes the menu to handle further events on the given layer. This is usually the layer handling a pointer start that caused the popup. A listener will be added to the layer and the menu notified of pointer drag and end events.

      • atEventPos

        @Deprecated
public MenuHost.Pop atEventPos(Events.Position pos)
        Deprecated. use TRIGGER_POINT
        Positions the menu popup at the given positional event.

      • atScreenPos

        @Deprecated
public MenuHost.Pop atScreenPos(float x,
                                  float y)
        Deprecated. use TRIGGER_POINT
        Positions the menu popup at the given screen position.

      • atLayerX

        @Deprecated
public MenuHost.Pop atLayerX(Layer layer,
                               float x)
        Deprecated. use TRIGGER_POINT
        Positions the menu horizontally relative to the given layer, with an offset. The

      • atLayerY

        @Deprecated
public MenuHost.Pop atLayerY(Layer layer,
                               float y)
        Deprecated. use TRIGGER_POINT
        Positions the menu vertically relative to the given layer, with an offset. The horizontal position remains unchanged.

      • halign

        @Deprecated
public MenuHost.Pop halign(Style.HAlign halign)
        Deprecated. use POPUP_ORIGIN
        Sets the horizontal alignment of the menu relative to the popup position.

      • valign

        @Deprecated
public MenuHost.Pop valign(Style.VAlign valign)
        Deprecated. use POPUP_ORIGIN
        Sets the vertical alignment of the menu relative to the popup position.

      • toLeft

        @Deprecated
public MenuHost.Pop toLeft(float x)
        Deprecated. use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
        Positions the right edge of the menu relative to the left edge of the trigger, offset by the given value.

      • toRight

        @Deprecated
public MenuHost.Pop toRight(float x)
        Deprecated. use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
        Positions the left edge of the menu relative to the right edge of the trigger, offset

      • toTop

        @Deprecated
public MenuHost.Pop toTop(float y)
        Deprecated. use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
        Positions the top edge of the menu relative to the top edge of the trigger, offset

      • toBottom

        @Deprecated
public MenuHost.Pop toBottom(float y)
        Deprecated. use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
        Positions the bottom edge of the menu relative to the bottom edge of the trigger, offset by the given value.

      • retainMenu

        public MenuHost.Pop retainMenu()
        Flags this Pop event so that the menu will not be destroyed automatically when it is deactivated. Returns this instance for chaining.

      • inScreenArea

        public MenuHost.Pop inScreenArea(pythagoras.f.IRectangle area)
        Optionally confines the menu area to the given screen area. By default the menu is confined by the host's screen area (see MenuHost.getScreenArea()).

      • inElement

        public MenuHost.Pop inElement(Element<?> elem)
        Optionally confines the menu area to the given element. By default the menu is confined by the host's screen area (see MenuHost.getScreenArea()).

      • popup

        public MenuHost popup()
        Pops up this instance on the trigger's root's menu host. See MenuHost.popup(Pop). For convenience, returns the host that was used to perform the popup.
